text: [›](/) [English](/kategori/english)›Jesus' sacrifice is the... Jesus' sacrifice is the greatest proof of love Jesus' extraordinary sacrifice was proof of his great love for his people. MAGELANG, KOMPAS — Through the sacrifice of atoning for human sins on the cross, Jesus has given proof of His greatest love for all mankind. This is [proof of love](https://www.kompas.id/label/salib?open_from=automate_body_url) from someone who gave his life for his friend. "There is no greater proof of love than that of someone who lays down his life for his friend and that is what Jesus did for all of us, human beings who are His friends and friends of God," said Father FX Suyamto Kirnosucitro, Pr in his homily at Worship Good Friday at St Mikael Church, Panca Arga Parish, in Mertoyudan District, Magelang Regency, Central Java, Friday (29/3/2024).
